name: Bar Night: Dating Simulator
description:
"Bar Night" is a text-based dating simulator game where you as the player take a vacation from your average, boring everyday life to a relaxing resort. You stay at the resort hoping to find something or maybe someone who will keep you company during your vacation. Good thing for you, it's all-night Happy Hour at the resort bar, so get out there and start mingling! What's even better is that you don't need to buy someone a drink first to get a date (wink wink, nudge nudge)!

If you want to play a chill but fun game, check out "Bar Night"!

This game was created using Twine Harlowe 3.3.3 and all graphics used are original illustrations.

Credits:

Story/Dialogue Writing: Yani Feng, Jane Qin, Yuan Liu

Background Graphics: Jane Qin, Yuan Liu

Illustrations & Editing: Yani Feng
